item.title: A practitioner's guide - Spin up a local VEBA environment with KinD and vCenter simulator
item.author: robert.guske@gmail.com

item.description: A practitioner's guide to spin up a local VMware Event Broker Appliance (VEBA) environment by using KinD and the vCenter simulator.

item.title: VMware Event Broker Appliance - vSphere HA Event Notification Function
item.author: robert.guske@gmail.com
item.dc:creator: Robert Guske
item.description: A post about a community function contribution to the open source project VMware Event Broker Appliance to notify you if a ESXi host failure occured.

item.description: Instead of pulling function images from Docker Hub, I'm going to explorer the use of the enterprise container image registry Harbor this time.
